display_long_description:
Metaenga — XR Training Platform that provides 17 ready-to-use VR training simulations in a single app, making the education more effective for energy sector

**VR Training Simulations:**

1. Digital Multimeter Basics
2. Motor Control Center Troubleshooting
3. Transformer Oil Sampling
4. Industrial Energy Isolation & LOTO
5. Fire Safety & Emergency Response
6. HV Substation Transformer Isolating
7. HV Electrical Substation Tour
8. Occupational Safety and Health
9. Feeder Protection Relay
10. Heat Shrink Cable Joint
11. Megger Relay and CT Test Set
12. Motor Operator Uncoupling Procedure
13. Work at Heights
14. Forklift Pre-use Inspection & Driving
15. Warehouse Operations & Picking
16. Vehicle Spotting & Hand Signal  
17. Helicopter Landing Training

**High-Quality Training Environment**

Train in ultra-realistic VR environments that accurately replicate real-world high-risk scenarios, boosting engagement and real-world skill transfer

[media]

**Practice High-Risk Tasks Safely**

Safely practice high-risk procedures in VR from basic to advanced tasks reducing accidents and equipment damage while building real-world confidence

[media]

**AI Training Analytics** 

AI-powered analytics track learner progress in real time delivering actionable insights to improve decision-mak

[media]

**Intuitive & Friendly UI/UX**

Clean, user-friendly design keeps learners focused on mastering technical procedures

[media]
